name: ORGANISATION FOR RURAL DEVELOPMENT

address: Lakshmi Nagar Velapady Post,  Chetpet Road,

briefDescription: ORGANISATION FOR RURAL DEVELOPMENT LOCATED IN ARNI, TAMIL NADU.A Brief History of ORD:Organisation for Rural Development (ORD) was formed in 1990 and is a secular Non-Governmental Organization. It aims at bringing about a change in the living standards of Rural Poor especially women and children. It has taken the motto 'TO EDUCATE and EQUIP RURAL POOR', and so it mainly focuses on women, children, landless laborers of poorest of the poor and Tribal communities who are known as Dalits. And it strongly believes in People's strength and capacity to facilitate their own process of development. It respects people's knowledge. Hence, ORD's approaches begin with people and end with people.
